verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:12
verses.text: And David said to Uriah, Tarry here to day also, and to morrow I will let thee depart. So Uriah abode in Jerusalem that day, and the morrow.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:13
verses.text: And when David had called him, he did eat and drink before him; and he made him drunk: and at even he went out to lie on his bed with the servants of his lord, but went not down to his house.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:14
verses.text: And it came to pass in the morning, that David wrote a letter to Joab, and sent it by the hand of Uriah.
